name: iTraceur - Parkour / Freerunning Platform Game
description:
THE FIRST PARKOUR / FREERUNNING GAME EVER CREATED BY TRACEURS!!!
Approved by David Belle - creator of parkour!


Parkour ( the art of displacement, freerunning ) is the physical discipline of training to overcome any obstacle within one's path by adapting one's movements to the environment.

Traceur (freerunner) is the practitioner of parkour.
In this game you control a traceur, making his way through the city.

COMPETE WITH YOUR FRIENDS ON 15 HUGE LEVELS IN TIMETRIAL MODES

OVERCOME ANY OBSTACLE WITH INCREDIBLE PARKOUR MOVES

WATCH PARKOUR VIDEOS BETWEEN LEVELS IN STORY MODE

COLLECT ALL BONUSES TO UNLOCK EVEN MORE VIDEOS

USE DOUBLE TAP TO PAUSE AND LOOK AROUND

FIND SECRETS TO REACH 100% GAME PROGRESS


Features:

1. Universal application
2. Beautiful retina graphics
3. Absolute realistic animations captured in Full HD
4. Downloadable Videos with first person parkour footage.
5. Look around mode - observe whole level!
6. Three game modes: Story, Timetrial and Harvest!
7. Training level explaining basic movements and tips!
8. Customizable Convenient Controls (3 size schemes with button displacement )!
9. Dynamic music.
